thread.title: Beautiful Hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: hashrogers
title: Beautiful Hotel
text:
Beautiful hotel. Excellent service. Modern rooms and very boutique feel. Bianca and Vera were fantastic at the reception. Alex the door man was brilliant. Thank you for a wonderful stay! Whenever we are in london, this is the hotel we are going to stay at.
Room Tip: Club room is worth it. They are a little bigger than the others and in london you need that as every... See more room tips
